author: Lizaveta Molyavka
description: Zesty lemon, bitter liqueur and tangy IPA makes for a zippy, refreshing drink. A characterful IPA and nailing exactly the right amount of honey are key to this drink's success.
name: Anything Else
recipeIngredient: 50 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
15 ml Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably block ice)
